about_the_game: The second album of songs written for the world of Hunt: Showdown 1896 by Port Sulphur Band, including fan favorites Dark in New Orleans and Bullet’s Lullaby. The album includes both mp3s and high-resolution audio files.
detailed_description: The second album of songs written for the world of Hunt: Showdown 1896 by Port Sulphur Band, including fan favorites Dark in New Orleans and Bullet’s Lullaby. The album includes both mp3s and high-resolution audio files.
